summary: The diff implements advanced animations and glassmorphism UI enhancements using CSS animations, Intersection Observer, and mouse tracking. However, it does NOT use Framer Motion as required. Key requirements like mask reveal animations, magnetic button effects, ripple clicks, section transition overlays, and magnetic hover between skill cards are missing. Several micro-interactions and premium effects are not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace all existing scroll animations with Framer Motion-based advanced animations including staggered children, spring physics, parallax effects, and micro-interactions
missing_requirements.reason: The implementation uses Intersection Observer and CSS animations instead of Framer Motion. While useFramerAnimations.ts hook file exists, it's not imported or used in any components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Magnetic cursor effects on buttons where buttons attract cursor within proximity range
missing_requirements.reason: No magnetic cursor effect implementation found. Buttons have hover effects but no magnetic attraction behavior.
No ripple effect implementation found in any interactive elements or buttons.

missing_requirements.requirement: Smooth page transitions between sections using slide or fade effects
missing_requirements.reason: No section transition animations implemented. Navigation simply scrolls smoothly without transition overlays.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add reveal-on-scroll animations with mask effects, where content appears through animated masks (wipes, circles, splits)
missing_requirements.reason: No mask-based reveal animations found. Components use simple opacity and translate effects instead of mask wipes or circular reveals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Magnetic hover effects between adjacent cards where adjacent cards react to hover with magnetic repulsion/attraction
missing_requirements.reason: Skills grid cards have hover effects but no magnetic interaction between adjacent cards.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add smooth page transition overlay with animated logo or loading state when navigating between major sections
missing_requirements.reason: No transition overlay or loading state implemented for section navigation. Transitions are handled by smooth scroll only.
